A

addGhost(Ghost) - Method in class ghost.GameManager
Add ghost to arraylist of ghost.
Ambusher - Class in ghost
 
Ambusher(String, PImage, Waka, int, int, PImage, PImage) - Constructor for class ghost.Ambusher
Store Ambusher intial position, Ambusher x/y pixels, all image of Ambusher in different mode, Ambusher current image,Ambusher x/y coordinate frameRate, Ambusher previous mode, duration scatter mode, duration chaser mode, Ambusher speed, duration frighten mode, direction of Ambusher, Ambusher target x/y, and indicate to draw line.
App - Class in ghost
 
App() - Constructor for class ghost.App
Create a new GameManager Object.

C

Character - Interface in ghost
 
Chaser - Class in ghost
 
Chaser(String, PImage, Waka, int, int, PImage, PImage) - Constructor for class ghost.Chaser
Store Chaser intial position, Chaser x/y pixels, all image of Chaser in different mode, Chaser current image,Chaser x/y coordinate frameRate, Chaser previous mode, duration scatter mode, duration chaser mode, Chaser speed, duration frighten mode, direction of Chaser, Chaser target x/y, and indicate to draw line.
checkBoundX(int) - Method in class ghost.Ghost
Return 27 if Xcoordinate of ghost target more than 27, return 0 if Xcoordinate of ghost target less than 0 and return number if its between 0 and 27.
checkBoundY(int) - Method in class ghost.Ghost
Return 35 if Ycoordinate of ghost target more than 35, return 0 if Ycoordinate of ghost target less than 0 and return number if its between 0 and 35.
checkDiffX() - Method in class ghost.Ghost
Find the difference between ghost target Xcoordinate and ghost Xcoordinate.
checkDiffY() - Method in class ghost.Ghost
Find the difference between ghost target Ycoordinate and ghost Ycoordinate.
checkGhostFrightenMode() - Method in class ghost.GameManager
Check Ghost mode, If ghost in frighten mode return true, otherwise false.
checkIntersection(Map) - Method in class ghost.Ghost
Return true if the ghost is in the intersection, return false if ghost is not in the intersection.
checkNextMove(Map) - Method in interface ghost.Character
Check object next move, if they able to change direction, their direction change.
checkNextMove(Map) - Method in class ghost.Ghost
Check ghost next move when ghost reach an intersection, by predicting the ghost future move and Calculate their future position with target position using the euclidean distance formula.
checkNextMove(Map) - Method in class ghost.Waka
This method check whether future direction can be applied to current direction.
checkTarget() - Method in class ghost.Ambusher
If Ambusher in chase mode, take waka Xcoordinate add/subtract (depend on waka direction) it by 4 coordinate a head waka direction.
checkTarget() - Method in class ghost.Chaser
If Chaser in chase mode, take waka Xcoordinate and Ycoordinate and set them as the targetX and targetY.
checkTarget() - Method in class ghost.Ghost
Set ghost target Xcoordinate and Ycoordinate based on each ghost behaviour.
checkTarget() - Method in class ghost.Ignorant
If Ignorant in chase mode, find the distance difference between them using distance formula.
checkTarget() - Method in class ghost.Whim
If Whim in chase mode, check for chaser existence, If chaser exist take chaser Xcoordinate and waka Xcoordinate then add/subtract waka Xcoordinate or waka Ycoordinate by 2 and this depend on the direction waka.
checkWakaCollision() - Method in class ghost.Ghost
Check collision between waka and ghost by this formula.
collide - Variable in class ghost.Ghost
Boolean to indicate collision between ghost and waka.
currentImage - Variable in class ghost.Ghost
Ghost current image.

direction - Variable in class ghost.Ghost

draw() - Method in class ghost.App
Draw all the Object contained inside the game manager
draw(PApplet) - Method in interface ghost.Character
Draw character in correct position, for X axis : Xcoordinate * 16 add by their Xpixels add offset, for Y axis : Ycoordinate * 16 add by Ypixels add offset.
draw(App) - Method in class ghost.GameManager
Draw the whole game, otherwise if user lose or win the game display the text.
draw(PApplet) - Method in class ghost.Ghost
Draw Ghost in correct position, for X axis : Xcoordinate * 16 add by their Xpixels add offset, for Y axis : Ycoordinate * 16 add by Ypixels add offset.
draw(App) - Method in class ghost.Map
Draw the map using the two dimensional array that contain Entities object: get the image from each object, Xcoordinate of the object and Ycoordinate of the object.
draw(PApplet) - Method in class ghost.Waka
Draw waka in correct position, for X axis : Xcoordinate * 16 add by their Xpixels subtract offset, for Y axis : Ycoordinate * 16 add by Ypixels subtract offset.
drawAllGhost(App) - Method in class ghost.GameManager
Draw All the ghost in correct position.
drawLine - Variable in class ghost.Ghost

Map - Class in ghost
 
Map(PImage, PImage, PImage, PImage, PImage, PImage, PImage, PImage, PImage) - Constructor for class ghost.Map
Store map layout in form of character, map layout in form of Entities object, all image of map object, all images of every type of fruits and number of ghost of each type.
mapCharToObject() - Method in class ghost.Map
Take two dimensional character array that represent the map stored in instance variable and convert them into a map layout in form of two dimensional Entities Object array.
mode - Variable in class ghost.Ghost
Ghost current mode.
moveDown(Map) - Method in class ghost.Waka
The method check if Down tile from waka is solid or not, if Down tile is not a solid waka can turn, but this happen only if the both pixels has turn to zero.
moveLeft(Map) - Method in class ghost.Waka
The method check if left tile from waka is solid or not, if left tile is not a solid waka can turn, but this happen only if the both pixels has turn to zero.
moveRight(Map) - Method in class ghost.Waka
The method check if right tile from waka is solid or not, if right tile is not a solid waka can turn, but this happen only if the both pixels has turn to zero.
moveUp(Map) - Method in class ghost.Waka
The method check if Up tile from waka is solid or not, if Up tile is not a solid waka can turn, but this happen only if the both pixels has turn to zero.

Set up the whole game object such as Map Object, JsonParser Object, Ghost object and put them inside an arraylist, Waka Object.This method load image for each object, set starting position for each object, pass through the information from JsonParser Object , save the font for text and set Chaser index.
